Articles.Content: So, Editor Tools are apparently broken in .20. Fine, I can deal with that. What I can't deal with is parts snapping to the center of parts when snapping to angles. Is there any way to shut that down?
So pressing 'V' doesn't work to turn it off? Well then, I'm afraid you'll just have to remove the plugin and wait for it to be updated.
There is a line in the settings.cfg file that reads something like 'PART SNAP INCLUDE VERTICAL'. Check if that line is set to 'true' and if it is change it to 'false'.

Hey guys, found this in another thread

Seems we can still use our beloved ED Tools

Here is an updated version of DEADBEEF's EdTools that works with 0.20, minus the CTRL key temporary clipping removal, and the command-line ship loading, neither of which I could figure out how to get to work in 0.20 in the amount of time I was willing to spend on it.

EdTools020.zip
That didnt' come up in my search, thank you for that.

There has been an update to editor tools. Its in the addon forums somewhere... I can't find the thread right now, but it was the one where the guy is putting together a list of working and not working mods. Sorry I can't be more helpful

There has been an update to editor tools. Its in the addon forums somewhere... I can't find the thread right now, but it was the one where the guy is putting together a list of working and not working mods. Sorry I can't be more helpful

Yup, if you look up 2 posts in this thread you will see I posted the link to get the update..

Please note that is an unofficial patch that was made very kindly by ghjm to help everyone out
